name: Sword of Atlas 1.2
description:
Sword of Atlas is a TRPG, built around an ATB meter and grid-based movement. Using these classic RPG mechanics, you will control multiple party members and make your way across the map.

Control Inputs: 

LEFT CLICK = Interract 

[BACKSPACE] / [SPACEBAR] = Cancel

[W][A][S][D] = Move camera (when not in menu)

[1] / [2] / [3] = Party selection hotkeys
